pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw:
I have added the teleop functionality using the keyboard in [939df5d](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/939df5dfe84d530aae2dea6d9b2a1f0ddf47ac5b). It defaults to the same functionality as before \(fixed thruster angles\). If you add the `set_thrust_angle` parameter, then you can change the thrust angle with `h` and `;`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo usv_keydrive.launch set_thrust_angle:=true`

Then in [80d34cd](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/80d34cdbe0385a0e63cf0cc0c9785b3879613d88), I added the ability to change the speed of thrust\_angle change \( `r`/ `v` for increase/decrease\)

Then in [d42d773](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/d42d7736fc6e04c6112d1297606e13167be7bd6e), I added the `max_angle` parameter than defaults to pi/2.

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo usv_keydrive.launch set_thrust_angle:=true max_angle:=3.1415`

‌

I used [https://github.com/ros-teleop/teleop\_twist\_keyboard/blob/master/teleop\_twist\_keyboard.py](https://github.com/ros-teleop/teleop_twist_keyboard/blob/master/teleop_twist_keyboard.py) as a reference for reading keys.
